title: PDAC mining conference goers asked to monitor for coronavirus symptoms after Sudbury area man tests positive - Financial Post
description: PDAC mining conference goers asked to monitor for coronavirus symptoms after Sudbury area man tests positive Financial Post Sudbury man who attended Toronto conference has COVID-19: health officials CP24 Toronto's Breaking News Coronavirus update: Man from Su…
content: Anyone who attended the Prospectors amp Developers Association of Canada convention in Toronto is being asked to monitor themselves for symptoms of the coronavirus after a man who attended was tested positive in the Sudbury area Dr Penny Sutcliffe chars
